questions.question: What is the dominant color of the visible label on the container?
What is the overall shape of the product's container?
What material appears to constitute the main body of the container?
What is the color of the top lid or cap of the container?
What is the apparent texture of the product inside the container?
What is the color of the text on the main label?
What is the primary brand name visible on the product?
What kind of seal is visible near the brand name?
What is the color of the smaller design elements on the label?
What is the general design style of the product label?
What seems to be the primary ingredient mentioned on the packaging?
What appears to be the format of the product's packaging?
What is visible on the far right side of the product's label?
What kind of information is prominently displayed aside from the brand name?
Is the overall impression of the product packaging simple or complex?
